name: Factory Floor
description:
Factory Floor is an arcade minigame of agility and focus in which you control Alex and Karl, who have to pile up sinister boxes in a post-apocalyptic factory commanded by USMa, a ruthless robot overlord obsessed with productivity.

Beat your best score, keep the factory's generators on at all times, and don't let the boss get angry!

You can also get this game for FREE (or any donation amount) on our Gamejolt store.

***
Minimum Specs:
OS: Windows 7 SP1+, macOS 10.12+
Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities.
RAM: 2 GB
Filesize: 300 MB (Win), 374 MB (Mac)
Input Devices: Keyboard
